entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
